product_name: Live TintedRays Copper Peptide Eye Masks
summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeVeganCooling eye masks that help soothe, brighten and nourish, Live Tinted's Rays Cooling Copper Peptide Eye Masks are supercharged with their Triple Complex of Copper Peptides, Banana Extract, and Bakuchiol.
details: DetailsFeaturesCooling undereye masksIndividually packaged for easy useBenefitsBrightensDepuffsHydratesFragrance-FreeKey IngredientsCopper Peptides boosts collagen production.Bakuchiol reduces the appearance of fine lines.Item 2599508How To UseApply under the eyes and leave on for up to 10 minutes, up to once daily use. Store in the fridge before use for an extra-cooling effect.For external use only.IngredientsWater, Glycerin, Dipropylene Glycol, Niacinamide, Squalane, Bakuchiol, Chondrus Crispus Extract, Copper Tripeptide-1, Tripeptide-1, Palmitoyl Pentapeptide-4, Dipeptide-2, Oligopeptide-1, Sodium Hyaluronate, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Extract, Caffeine, Ascorbic Acid, Musa Sapientum (Banana) Fruit Extract, Tocopherol, Leontopodium Alpinum Callus Culture Extract, Cucumis Sativus (Cucumber) Fruit Extract, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Water, 6 Ceratonia Siliqua (Carob) Gum, Hydroxyacetophenone, Cellulose Gum, Polyglyceryl-10 Laurate, Alumina, Caprylyl Glycol, Potassium Chloride, Sucrose, Iron Oxides (CI 77491), Disodium EDTA, Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, 1,2-Hexanediol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Butylene Glycol, Dipotassium Glycyrrhizate.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Apply under the eyes and leave on for up to 10 minutes, up to once daily use. Store in the fridge before use for an extra-cooling effect.For external use only.

reviews.headline: Love your eyes
reviews.comments: Ive tried many eye patches these are a mircle for your eyes! The best ive found!!

reviews.headline: Love your eyes
reviews.comments: Ive tried many eye patches these are a mircle for your eyes! The best ive found!!

reviews.headline: Irritated
reviews.comments: Before time was up it irritated under my eyes.

reviews.headline: Nice product!
reviews.comments: I'm a huge fan of copper peptides in skincare and discovered these cute little eye masks from Live Tinted. These are very easy to use (doesn't fold into itself) and stays in place until you are done.  Eyes feel and look bright and refreshed.  My only complaint is only 5 per pack!  Recommend!

reviews.headline: Amazing
reviews.comments: If you have dark circles these are the only patches that work!

reviews.headline: Copper eye masks
reviews.comments: Loved these eye masks. Cute design and brightened up my under eyes a bit. They did slip around in the packaging but went on nice and stayed on. Good amount of serum on the masks as well.

reviews.headline: Was okay for my first eye mask
reviews.comments: So I had more than enough product and the eye masks stayed in place on my face. They did slide all over the little tray they came in but it wasn't a big deal. I didn't notice a difference except the patch under my left eye tingled and burned a bit. I don't have any breakouts in that area so maybe this product just isn't right for my sensitive skin. I received this as a free sample so I'm happy I at least got to try it at no cost.

reviews.headline: Packaging is an issue
reviews.comments: I love how cute these are and the benefits they claim to give your under eyes. The ingredients list is amazing too. BUT, my biggest issue is the packaging! The masks do not have enough serum to even last 1 minute before they dry on your face.  I don't see how these 5 eye masks are worth this price point. Each package i've opened is a struggle because the eye masks are not aligned with the protecting sheets they are suppose to be secured in. Also, most the serum sticks to these sheets and not the actual mask.

reviews.headline: Copper
reviews.comments:
Pro - Copper encourages the development of collagen

Con - caffine can dehydrated skin

reviews.headline: I would but this product again
reviews.comments: Worked well, bonus that they were on sale

reviews.headline: Great eye pads!
reviews.comments: Superior product at a great price point. Smooths & depuffs my under eye area very nicely. Does not slip off when wearing.

reviews.headline: Catching some Rays
reviews.comments: I love using this copper ray eye masks before a night out or special event to make my under eyes moisturized and brightened! Love that they are biodegradable too! Only thing I would change would be the packaging.

reviews.headline: Even HE noticed
reviews.comments:
Just as the title says, even my partner complimented how bright and toned my under eyes looked. To be fair, he saw me wearing them but he's also brutally honest if he doesn't see a difference. These do indeed, make your under eye area almost shimmer and the skin tightens up nicely during your session.

Others have mentioned packaging - ok, it's not perfect. Before putting the masks on rub them around in the serum that collected in the trays and even if the bag if needed. You can also put the serum directly on your skin and cover it with the masks. The mask is there to hold the serum in, that's it. I haven't experienced any mis-shaped masks. 

I love these am and about to make my second purchase of them.

reviews.headline: Regrets!
reviews.comments:
I purchased these when they were part of a 21 Days of Beauty and even at the beauty steal price, they were not worth it. 

The patches were almost totally dry and did nothing. As other reviewers have mentioned, some were cut differently (missing the corner or end). 

Over the past decade, I've used tons of different under eye masks and I would rank these at the bottom of the list. Sad!

reviews.headline: Poor packaging and not enough products
reviews.comments: There was not any serum on the patches. And also when I opened the package the eye patches was not in the placement were it suppose to be at. Will not purchase again.

reviews.headline: Cute but…
reviews.comments: These are super cute and fun to wear, but as many other reviewers have said: there was a lot of packaging, and the eye mask slid around in the tray, and by the time I went to use them, it did not feel like there was much serum on them. They were a fun treat, but I will not repurchase.

reviews.headline: Amazing
reviews.comments: Love them they stay on, and don't fall off. Saw an actual difference after I took them off. Great for a spa day.

reviews.headline: Packing & quality control
reviews.comments: They worked, but both piece were not the same size and did not cover the same amount of area needed. It was hard to get them out, the top film they use to cover each eye pad doesn't stay in place (It's pointless & annoying). If they can insure that both pieces are the same size, tweak packaging a bit & add a tad bit of product; I'd recommend & buy again.

reviews.headline: Poor packaging and not enough product
reviews.comments: The concept is beautiful and the rays are adorable with their color and shape. That said, the packaging is horrible and the rays slid off the plastic and the serum slid off the eye masks in transit. So essentially, there was no product to actually put under my eyes during application. Will not buy this product again, it was a waste of money.

reviews.headline: not juicy enough
reviews.comments: bulky packing and not enough serum, i wish the masks were a little wider for more coverage. not luxurious feeling, glad I got them on sale. wouldn't buy again

properties.name: Cons

values.label: Packaging is bigger than most eye patches

display_values: Packaging is bigger than most eye patches

media.headline: Stays in place & provides a quick brightening fix
media.caption: They stay in place and are cute!

faceoff_positive.comments: I didn't have any issues with serum like other reviews but will admit the packaging is large for an eye patch.  Most importantly though, these eye patches stay in place and de-puff eyes.  They stay in place… this is huge because I feel like half the battle of eye patches is trying to keep the slimy suckers in place!  Even my husband was able to wear them (and not complain about them!) Cool to touch and didn't irritate skin.  I would recommend and buy again.
faceoff_positive.headline: Stays in place & provides a quick brightening fix

faceoff_negative.comments: I love how cute these are and the benefits they claim to give your under eyes. The ingredients list is amazing too. BUT, my biggest issue is the packaging! The masks do not have enough serum to even last 1 minute before they dry on your face.  I don't see how these 5 eye masks are worth this price point. Each package i've opened is a struggle because the eye masks are not aligned with the protecting sheets they are suppose to be secured in. Also, most the serum sticks to these sheets and not the actual mask.
faceoff_negative.headline: Packaging is an issue
